org.spongepowered.api.boss

Interface ServerBossBar

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BossBar, Identifiable

    public interface ServerBossBar
extends BossBar
    Represents a boss bar controlled by a Server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ServerBossBar.Builder
      Represents a builder class to create mutable ServerBossBars.
